name: Speaking - Part 1: Work/Study
questionContents: (Work/Study) What do you do, do you work or are you a student?
(Work/Study) Why did you choose that job/subject?
(Work/Study) What responsibilities do you have at work/school?
(Work/Study) Do you get on well with your colleagues/classmates?
(Work/Study) If you had the chance, would you change your job/subject?

name: Speaking - Part 1: Home/Hometown
questionContents: (Home/Hometown) Where is your hometown?
(Home/Hometown) What is your favorite room in your home?
(Home/Hometown) Do you like your hometown?
(Home/Hometown) How are the walls decorated in your home?
(Home/Hometown) What would you change about your hometown/home?

name: Speaking - Part 1: Family/Friends
questionContents: (Family/Friends) How many people are there in your immediate family?
(Family/Friends) Who do you get on best with in your family?
(Family/Friends) What do you usually do with your friends?
(Family/Friends) What kind of people do you like to have as friends?
(Family/Friends) How much time do you manage to spend with members of your family?

name: Speaking - Part 1: Hobbies/Interests
questionContents: (Hobbies/Interests) What do you enjoy doing in your free time?
(Hobbies/Interests) How did you become interested in this hobby?
(Hobbies/Interests) Do you prefer indoor or outdoor activities?
(Hobbies/Interests) How much time do you spend on your hobbies each week?
(Hobbies/Interests) Are your hobbies popular in your country?

name: Speaking - Part 1: Daily Routine
questionContents: (Daily Routine) When do you usually get up in the morning?
(Daily Routine) What is your typical daily routine?
(Daily Routine) Do you usually have the same routine every day?
(Daily Routine) What's your favorite time of the day?
(Daily Routine) Is your routine the same today as it was when you were a child?

name: Describe a family member you spend a lot of time with
questionContents: (Family member) Who this person is?
(Family member) What relationship you have with this person?
(Family member) What activities you do together?
(Family member) Explain why you spend the most time with him/her.

name: Describe a person who expresses his/her feelings openly
questionContents: (Feelings openly) Who that person is?
(Feelings openly) How long you have known him/her?
(Feelings openly) How he/she expresses feelings?
(Feelings openly) Explain how you feel about this person.

name: Describe someone you admire
questionContents: (Admire) Who this person is?
(Admire) How you know this person?
(Admire) What qualities this person has?
(Admire) Explain why you admire this person.

name: Describe a famous person in your country
questionContents: (Famous Person) Who this person is?
(Famous Person) What they do?
(Famous Person) Why they are famous?
(Famous Person) Explain how people in your country feel about this person.

name: Describe a friend who talks a lot
questionContents: (Friend talks a lot) Who this person is?
(Friend talks a lot) How you met this person?
(Friend talks a lot) What you usually do together?
(Friend talks a lot) Explain how you feel about this person.

name: Describe a present you have given someone
questionContents: (Present) What the present was?
(Present) Who you gave it to?
(Present) When you gave it?
(Present) Explain why you decided to give this particular gift.

name: Describe something you own which is very important to you
questionContents: (Important object) Where you got it from?
(Important object) How long you have had it?
(Important object) What you use it for?
(Important object) Explain why it is important to you.

name: Describe a change that could improve your local area
questionContents: (Local change) What the change would be?
(Local change) How this change could be made?
(Local change) Who would benefit from the change?
(Local change) Explain how this change would improve your local area.

name: Describe a time when the weather prevented you from doing something
questionContents: (Weather) When it happened?
(Weather) What you planned to do?
(Weather) What the weather was like?
(Weather) Explain how you felt when you had to change your plans.

name: Describe an exciting experience you have had
questionContents: (Exciting experience) What you did?
(Exciting experience) Where and when it happened?
(Exciting experience) Who you were with?
(Exciting experience) Explain why it was exciting for you.
